default: ^This is the default knot, we should not be reading this in game
a: ^I have traveled far to bring you a legendary weapon...A rare treasure, and quite the bargain... Please have a look...

c-0: ^Such rudeness! You should know I have many other shops where I could sell my items!
c-1: ^Yes, child. Legendary... the most powerful and spectacular weapon of our time.

c: ^What?! You lack the coin? The audacity! You fool! You have dishonored this sacred trade!! I take great offense... Let us never meet again.
d: ^What !! Are you trying to buy this beautiful sword at such a measly price !! I take great offense.. Let us never see each other again..
e: ^You refuse this amazing offer? You cheap… child! How utterly insulting!
